metadata.title: USN-6293-1 -- OpenStack Heat vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that OpenStack Heat incorrectly handled certain hidden parameter values. A remote authenticated user could possibly use this issue to obtain sensitive data.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6293-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  heat-api - 1:18.0.1-0ubuntu1.1 heat-api-cfn - 1:18.0.1-0ubuntu1.1 heat-common - 1:18.0.1-0ubuntu1.1 heat-engine - 1:18.0.1-0ubuntu1.1 python3-heat - 1:18.0.1-0ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
